Actions.Text: REFERRED TO COMMERCE, ECONOMIC DEVELOPMENT AND SMALL BUSINESS
REFERRED TO COMMERCE, ECONOMIC DEVELOPMENT AND SMALL BUSINESS

Title: Grants eligibility for the economic transformation and facility redevelopment program tax credit to certain state psychiatric centers with decommissioned or surplus land
Summary: Grants eligibility for the economic transformation and facility redevelopment program tax credit to certain state psychiatric centers with decommissioned or surplus land.
LawCode: Amd §§400 & 402, Ec Dev L; amd §35, Tax L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the economic development law and the tax law, in relation to granting eligibility for the economic transformation and facility redevelopment program tax credit to certain state psychiatric centers with decommissioned or surplus land
